statements: SELECT * FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY drug_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT drug_name, drug_class, interaction_risk FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_risk = 'High'
SELECT drug_name, contraindications FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_class = 'Antibiotics'
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_class LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS number_of_drugs FROM drug_interactions
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY drug_name DESC, interaction_risk ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT drug_name, drug_class FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_risk = 'High' AND contraindications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT drug_id, drug_class, interaction_risk FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_class LIKE '%Antibiotic%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_risk = 'Moderate' OR interaction_risk = 'High' ORDER BY drug_class ASC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk, contraindications FROM drug_interactions WHERE contraindications LIKE '%heart%' OR contraindications LIKE '%liver%' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_risk = 'High';
SELECT drug_id, contraindication_reason FROM Contraindications WHERE drug_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Contraindications WHERE contraindication_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_risk = 'High' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, contraindication_reason FROM Drug_Interactions JOIN Contraindications ON Drug_Interactions.drug_id = Contraindications.drug_id;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_risk FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE drug_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT drug_name, contraindication_reason FROM Drug_Interactions INNER JOIN Contraindications ON Drug_Interactions.drug_id = Contraindications.drug_id ORDER BY drug_name DESC, contraindication_reason ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk FROM drug_interaction WHERE interaction_risk = 'High';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk FROM drug_interaction WHERE drug_id = 2;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk FROM drug_interaction WHERE interaction_risk = 'Low' ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contraindications WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_risk FROM drug_interaction WHERE interaction_risk = 'High' ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT contraindication_id, description FROM contraindications WHERE drug_id = 2 AND contraindicated_drug_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM drug_relationship WHERE relationship_type = 'Interacts' OR relationship_type = 'Contradicts';
SELECT drug_id_1, drug_id_2 FROM drug_relationship WHERE drug_id_1 < drug_id_2 ORDER BY drug_id_1 ASC, drug_id_2 DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, drug_class FROM drug_bank ORDER BY drug_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_level, report_date FROM interaction_reports WHERE interaction_level = 'Severe';
SELECT drug_id, condition FROM contraindications WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY interaction_type DESC;
SELECT drug_name, contraindications FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT * FROM drug_bank WHERE drug_class = 'Antibiotics' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_level, report_date FROM interaction_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drug_interaction WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description FROM drug WHERE id = 3;
SELECT type_name, description FROM interaction_type WHERE id = 2;
SELECT drug_name, category FROM drug WHERE category = 'Pain Relief';
SELECT * FROM drug_interaction ORDER BY drug_name DESC, interaction_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM drug_interaction GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT drug_name, description FROM drug WHERE category = 'Pain Relief' AND id IN (SELECT drug_id FROM contraindications WHERE interaction_id = 3);
SELECT type_name, description FROM interaction_type WHERE id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM contraindications WHERE drug_id = 5);
SELECT * FROM drug_category WHERE description LIKE '%brain%' OR category_name = 'Neurological' ORDER BY category_name ASC;
